aiCapability.label: AI Capability
aiCapability.tooltip: Overall power of AI systems. Higher values accelerate automation and wage gains for complementary roles.

adoptionSpeed.label: Adoption Speed
adoptionSpeed.tooltip: How quickly businesses deploy AI. Drives effective automation rate alongside AI capability.

regulation.label: Regulation
regulation.tooltip: Government AI regulation stringency. Slows adoption and reduces job displacement.

retraining.label: Retraining Programs
retraining.tooltip: Investment in worker retraining. Cushions unemployment but does not appear in core equations yet (v0.1 placeholder).

transfers.label: Social Transfers
transfers.tooltip: Government transfer payments (UBI-style). Stabilizes food prices and inequality (v0.1 placeholder).

laborProtection.label: Labor Protections
laborProtection.tooltip: Strength of labor laws against layoffs. Reduces per-year job loss rate.

corporateConcentration.label: Corporate Concentration
corporateConcentration.tooltip: Market power of large firms. Suppresses wage growth and increases inequality.

energyCost.label: Energy Cost Shock
energyCost.tooltip: Energy price deviation from baseline. Positive = higher costs, driving food price inflation.

supplyChainResilience.label: Supply Chain Resilience
supplyChainResilience.tooltip: Robustness of logistics networks. Higher values dampen food price spikes from logistics job loss.
